title: Riot I know you guys are currently making a new support champion
body:
It's obvious, it's been a while since we got a support.

I am hoping that this new support champion isn't another typical {{champion:117}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:143}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:267}} that's all girly and magical. We have enough of that as is FOR NOW.

I hope that this new support doesn't have a basic kit like  {{champion:89}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:223}} 

Please for the love of god make another fun support champion that isn't with a personality like {{champion:142}} or {{champion:99}} I don't want to hear another obnoxious, loud, and overly positive voice/quotes.

Let this support's kit become something interactive and epic like {{champion:412}} {{champion:497}} {{champion:12}} 

I don't wanna be the ADC's bitch anymore where I heal, increase movement speed, shield, etc I wanna be an ALL around support that makes plays and aid my team as a whole at the same time. Just how {{champion:412}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:412}}{{champion:98}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:98}}   is like. (Shen isnt a support but he is played as a support and can do a good job.)

Thresh is such a perfect example. He looks cool, he is cool, he sounds cool, his kit is epic, and he gets a well deserved recognition when plays happen.

replies.body: Why are all the full enchanters female?
{{champion:44}} {{item:3504}} {{item:3174}} He'll enchant you all night long.
Ah good points. I forgot about them, and the enchanters class league page isn't up to date. xD

> [{quoted}](name=Banbutsu Sozo,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XMgBcTM5,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-02-28T21:56:57.644+0000)
>
> Why are all the full enchanters female?

{{champion:432}}

I mean, zyra killed someone and currently inhabits her body. I dont think that would class as girly/magical

Also where taric @?
When you kill some Girl in cold blood and take over her still warm body to inhabit it yourself #justGirlyThings
You seem to have missed Taric in your post, so might want to give him a go.

Implying that {{champion:497}} is Interactive L U L 

Yeah boi, sure is "interactive" getting chain-CC'd from a entire screen away by his R-W combo with no counterplay.

As far as Thresh and Ali go, yeah alright those two are fine in my book...

Except Rakan has to dive in and is squishy as hell. Without Xayah, he can't do it from a screen away without flash. He's kinda like Blitz or Fiddle too, having vision in more areas means you can see when he's coming and prepare for him.

> having vision in more areas

Yeah, about that... With all the changes to vision systems (Sightstone active moved to support quests, Tracker's Knife removal... etc.) it's progressively getting harder and harder to get vision down in your average YoloQ game... 

Sometimes i truly don't understand Riot's stance on the vision game

I don't get the Tracker's Knife removal either. The Sightstone quest thing on its own is fine, but combined with this removal and we're heading back to supports being the only ones who ward, which is what they were moving away from way back during the big ward changes. Only this time it's worse because a support can't light up the whole map with only 4 wards.

> [{quoted}](name=GothicV2,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XMgBcTM5,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-02-28T21:38:21.278+0000)
>
> It&#039;s obvious, it&#039;s been a while since we got a support.

First of all this is extremely presumptuous. You are essentially begging the question, and claiming the absence of something is evidence of that something being done. This just rubbed me the wrong way, and it needed to be called out.

> I hope that this new support doesn&#039;t have a basic kit like  {{champion:89}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:223}} 

http://s2.quickmeme.com/img/3b/3bc13f1858415cbb2317657f61b69115e82cedcd2b5c0936e5cc6720d4aba641.jpg

Tahm Kench is far from basic. Leona must balance between diving targets and peeling for her teammates. And Blitzcrank, while definitely having most of his power in one ability, has been re-designed to make him more complex.

---

I don't have issue with the rest of what you said, they're your opinions and you are entitled to them. But these two sections needed to be challenged.
